0c0bc5ae.confession: I once broke my neighbor's window with a baseball and never confessed. They still think it was a stray ball, and I never owned up to my mistake.

e9dcac06.confession: I pretended to have read a classic novel in high school to impress my English teacher. I managed to pull it off, but I still haven't read the book.
